ISSUE.TITLE: docs: improve Chinese copywriting
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: ### Improved or typo fixed. Copywriting in `docs/zh/latest` have different formats: - some writings have one space before/after English words but some have no. - some punctuations used in halfwidth form but some in fullwidth. [what's differences between fullwidth and halfwidth](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Halfwidth_and_fullwidth_forms) ### Solution * Add copywriting guidelines, include rules[1] > reference: [chinese-copywriting-guidelines](https://sparanoid.com/note/chinese-copywriting-guidelines/) * Add [lint tool](https://sparanoid.com/note/chinese-copywriting-guidelines/#tools) in code-lint workflow [1] [Spacing](https://sparanoid.com/note/chinese-copywriting-guidelines/#spacing) - [Place one space before/after English words](https://sparanoid.com/note/chinese-copywriting-guidelines/#place-one-space-beforeafter-english-words) - [Place one space before/after numbers](https://sparanoid.com/note/chinese-copywriting-guidelines/#place-one-space-beforeafter-numbers) - [Place one space between numbers and units](https://sparanoid.com/note/chinese-copywriting-guidelines/#place-one-space-between-numbers-and-units) - [No additional spaces before/after punctuation in fullwidth form](https://sparanoid.com/note/chinese-copywriting-guidelines/#no-additional-spaces-beforeafter-punctuation-in-fullwidth-form) - [text-spacing to the rescue?](https://sparanoid.com/note/chinese-copywriting-guidelines/#text-spacing-to-the-rescue) [Punctuation](https://sparanoid.com/note/chinese-copywriting-guidelines/#punctuation) - [Avoid duplicate punctuation](https://sparanoid.com/note/chinese-copywriting-guidelines/#avoid-duplicate-punctuation) [Fullwidth and halfwidth](https://sparanoid.com/note/chinese-copywriting-guidelines/#fullwidth-and-halfwidth) - [Use punctuation in fullwidth form](https://sparanoid.com/note/chinese-copywriting-guidelines/#use-punctuation-in-fullwidth-form) - [Use numbers in halfwidth form](https://sparanoid.com/note/chinese-copywriting-guidelines/#use-numbers-in-halfwidth-form) - [Use punctuation in halfwidth form for English sentences](https://sparanoid.com/note/chinese-copywriting-guidelines/#use-punctuation-in-halfwidth-form-for-english-sentences)
